name: winter walk scarf
notes:
*** knitting pattern - instant download *** this is not the finished item!

super squishy texture using just  a one row repeat makes this scarf the perfect easy knit, ideal for both beginners and experienced knitters.

a free version of this pattern is available on my blog: https://www.snufflebean.co.uk/winter-walk-scarf-free-knitting-pattern/

difficulty:

this scarf is the perfect challenge for a beginner looking to improve their skills, or for an experienced knitter looking for a quick and modern make. this pattern comes with permission to sell your finished items.

materials needed:

- approx. 300g james c brett emotions dk
- 4mm circular knitting needles / 4mm straight needles
- tapestry needle & scissors 

size:

size can easily be adjusted to make the scarf of your dreams!

i would love to see any finished items you make - you can find me on facebook https://www.facebook.com/snufflebeanyarn and on instagram @snufflebeanyarn
